/* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ */ import { EnvelopeIcon, PhoneIcon } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; const people = [ { name: "Jane Cooper", title: "Regional Paradigm Technician", role: "Admin", email: "janecooper@example.com", telephone: "+1-202-555-0170", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=256&h=256&q=60", }, { name: "Jane Cooper", title: "Regional Paradigm Technician", role: "Admin", email: "janecooper@example.com", telephone: "+1-202-555-0170", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=256&h=256&q=60", }, { name: "Jane Cooper", title: "Regional Paradigm Technician", role: "Admin", email: "janecooper@example.com", telephone: "+1-202-555-0170", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=256&h=256&q=60", }, { name: "Jane Cooper", title: "Regional Paradigm Technician", role: "Admin", email: "janecooper@example.com", telephone: "+1-202-555-0170", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=256&h=256&q=60", }, { name: "Jane Cooper", title: "Regional Paradigm Technician", role: "Admin", email: "janecooper@example.com", telephone: "+1-202-555-0170", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=256&h=256&q=60", }, { name: "Jane Cooper", title: "Regional Paradigm Technician", role: "Admin", email: "janecooper@example.com", telephone: "+1-202-555-0170", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=256&h=256&q=60", }, // More people... ]; export default function Example() { return (
    {people.map((person) => (

  • {person.name}

    {person.role}

    {person.title}

    Email
    Call
    • ))}
); }
